title: New computer - Worse performance (in League only)
body:
Hey guys, I need your help, I built a new PC and ever since using League on it has been plagued with serious frame stutters. On my old laptop, I could crank the settings all the way up, turn on Vsync, and it'd be super butter smooth. But now with my new build, after doing the same, I get really weird stutters and tears.

Old specs

8gb ddr3 1600mhz
I7 (laptop) 2.4ghz 
Gtx 860m 4gb
Running at 1080p resolution.

New specs

16gb ddr3 1866mhz
I5-4690 3.7 ghz (oc)
GTX 1060 3gb (oc)
Running on the same monitor as the laptop was before.

Thank you! {{champion:131}}

replies.body: Your PC may just need some tuning up for a smooth game, being new and all.  Run through the steps in the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help with that.  You may also need to disable vsync to help with the tears.  I hope that helps!
